review_data.title: Leuke locatie
review_data.content: Super locatie en goed eten. Moet je gedaan hebben als je in Zürich bent. Geweldig uitzicht in de toren.

review_data.title: Coffee bar in the Allianz tower, across fro the Glatt Zentrum
review_data.content: Not a bad place to sit down and have coffee, prices are comparable to any coffee place in the area. Small selection of bakery items. Outside seating when the weather is warm.

review_data.title: Empfehlenswert
review_data.content: Der Staff ist sehr feundlich. Der Schwarztee in Blätter sehr gut. Es gibt hohe Tische oder Sofas, wo wir gemütlich...More

review_data.title: Very reasonably priced drinks & snacks
review_data.content: The Tower Bar is located across the street from the Glatt Zentrum and inside the Allianz building lobby. Mostly frequented by the office workers during the course of the day, this place has very reasonably priced hot beverages and a nice selection of desserts, pastries,...More

review_data.title: Einfach nur klasse!
review_data.content: Dies ist eine top Bar bei uns in Wallisellen. Der Service ist 1a und der Kaffee schmeckte sehr gut. Ich...More

review_data.title: Stylish little bar
review_data.content: We came for coffees to this very nice and stylish little bar. It is located on the ground floor of the Allianz tower across the Glatt center. Service was very friendly and all coffees tasted great.
